title: Ritchey Skyline Alloy Drop Bar is Tom Ritchey’s Most Ergonomic Road Handlebar
content:
The new Skyline combines Ritchey’s long-running segmented anatomic bend with modern ergo features like backsweep on the tops, flare in the drops, and size-specific compact…

The post Ritchey Skyline Alloy Drop Bar is Tom Ritchey’s Most Ergonomic Road Handlebar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
